SELECT PR_NUM as prNum, PROGRESS_CD as progressCd, PC_TYPE as pcType, DEPT_CD as reqDeptCd, CTRL_USER_ID as ctrlUserId FROM PRHD WHERE PR_NUM = #{prNum} AND DEL_FLAG = 'N' FOR UPDATE
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM RFQHD WHERE PR_NUM = #{prNum} AND DEL_FLAG = 'N'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO RFQHD ( RFQ_NUM, RFQ_SUBJECT, RFQ_DATE, PR_NUM, PROGRESS_CD, CTRL_USER_ID, REG_DATE, REG_USER_ID, DEL_FLAG ) SELECT #{rfqNum}, CONCAT('RFQ for ', h.PR_SUBJECT), NOW(), h.PR_NUM, 'T', #{userId}, NOW(), #{userId}, 'N' FROM PRHD h WHERE h.PR_NUM = #{prNum} AND h.DEL_FLAG = 'N'

INSERT INTO RFQDT ( RFQ_NUM, LINE_NO, ITEM_CD, ITEM_DESC, ITEM_SPEC, UNIT_CD, RFQ_QT, EST_UNIT_PRC, EST_AMT, DELY_DATE, WH_NM, RMK, REG_DATE, REG_USER_ID, DEL_FLAG ) SELECT #{rfqNum}, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY pd.PR_NUM ORDER BY pd.ITEM_CD), pd.ITEM_CD, pd.ITEM_DESC, pd.ITEM_SPEC, pd.UNIT_CD, pd.PR_QT, pd.UNIT_PRC, pd.PR_AMT, pd.DELY_DATE, NULL, pd.RMK, NOW(), #{userId}, 'N' FROM PRDT pd WHERE pd.PR_NUM = #{prNum} AND pd.DEL_FLAG = 'N'
